text: Ghosts is an upcoming American television sitcom adapted from the 2019 BBC One series of the same name, created by Mathew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, and Ben Willbond for CBS. The series debuted on October 7, 2021. The third season is currently airing. == Premise == Samantha (Rose McIver) and Jay (Utkarsh Ambudkar) believe that their dreams have come true in receiving a beautiful country house, only to find that it is falling apart and inhabited by a number of deceased previous residents from different periods and eras. == Cast == * Rose McIver as Samantha * Utkarsh Ambudkar as Jay * Brandon Scott Jones as Isaac * Richie Moriarty as Pete * Asher Grodman as Trevor * Rebecca Wisocky as Hetty * Sheila Carrasco as Flower (seasons 1 and 2) * Danielle Pinnock as Alberta * Roman Zaragoza as Sasappis * Devan Chandler Long as Thorfinn == References == == Other websites == * Category:2021 American television series debuts Category:2020s American sitcoms Category:American television series based on British television series Category:CBS network shows
